bibl.title: Stage Directions. Essays in Ancient Drama in Honour of E.W. Handley

bibl.seg: EASTERLING Pat, Menander: Loss and Survival. ζώεις εἰς αἰῶνα (AP 9. 187).

The gradual disappearance of the texts of Menander and the influence of the "Menander" constructed by the gnomai monostichoi.
